title: Bow of the Banshee
content:
18m Two-Handed 0.9 190

Bow of the Banshee

Blood-Curdling Emission: On a hit, possibly inflict Frightened. Gain a +1d4 bonus to attack and damage against Frightened creatures.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The impression of an elven face screams silently from the finely curved bow - the image becomes even more disturbing when the bowstring snaps forward on release, emitting a blood-curdling wail.
